bibl.title: Aspects of Church Finance in the Seventh-Century Hermopolite According to P. Lond. Copt. I 1077.

series.title: Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Kommission für antike Rechtsgeschichte. Papyrologica Vindobonensia.

bibl.note: P. Lond. Copt. Inv. 1077 [ed.: EADEM, P. Lond. Copt. I 1077: Taxes in Money in Seventh-Century Egypt, OCP 67 (2001) pp. 385-436, pll.]. Data are presented in list form: A. Clergy; - B. Religious institutions and foundations.

bibl.title: Akten des 23. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses. Wien, 22.-28. Juli 2001

bibl.seg: MacCOULL Leslie S.B., Aspects of Church Finance in the Seventh-Century Hermopolite According to P. Lond. Copt. I 1077.

Bernhard PALME (Hg.), Akten des 23. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses. Wien, 22.-28. Juli 2001 = Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Kommission für antike Rechtsgeschichte. Papyrologica Vindobonensia. 1 (Wien, 2007) pp. 415-419.

P. Lond. Copt. Inv. 1077 [ed.: EADEM, P. Lond. Copt. I 1077: Taxes in Money in Seventh-Century Egypt, OCP 67 (2001) pp. 385-436, pll.]. Data are presented in list form: A. Clergy; - B. Religious institutions and foundations.
